channel.title: causal inference on Murat Unal
channel.description: Recent content in causal inference on Murat Unal

item.title: Fewer Clicks, More Purchases
item.description: We study how introducing a one-step checkout algorithm impacts consumer behavior and the economic value it generates for retailers in e-commerce.

item.title: The Impact of Online Product Sampling on Customer Behavior
item.description: In this study we show how online product sampling as a marketing strategy impacts consumer behavior and quantify the economic value it generates for retailers in e-commerce.
